title: PSA: Watch out for phishing emails from genuine mailing lists, following Mailchimp hack
content:
A Mailchimp hack means that you’ll want to be even more vigilant than usual about phishing emails. Attackers have taken a clever approach to making their emails appear genuine …

more…

The post PSA: Watch out for phishing emails from genuine mailing lists, following Mailchimp hack appeared first on 9to5Mac.
